description.ruby-sapphire:
Cuts the foe with sharp
scythes, claws, etc.
description.emerald:
Cuts the foe with sharp
scythes, claws, etc.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A basic attack.
It can be used to
cut down thin trees
and grass.

scythe or a claw.
It can also be used
to cut down thin
trees.
